# Key Information (Prove API)

<Tabs>
  <TabItem value="mainnet" label="Mainnet">
    
**API Endpoint:** `proof.polymer.zone`

**Dashboard:** [dashboard.polymer.org](https://dashboard.polymerlabs.org/)

**CrossL2Prover Contract:** `0x95ccEAE71605c5d97A0AC0EA13013b058729d075`

  </TabItem>
  <TabItem value="testnet" label="Testnet (Sepolia)">
    
**API Endpoint:** `proof.testnet.polymer.zone`

**Dashboard:** [dashboard.polymer.org](https://dashboard.polymerlabs.org/) (toggle to Sepolia)


**CrossL2Prover Contract:** `0x03Fb5bFA4EB2Cba072A477A372bB87880A60fC96`

  </TabItem>
  <TabItem value="contract" label="Contract Information">
    
**Mainnet Address:** `0x95ccEAE71605c5d97A0AC0EA13013b058729d075`

**Testnet Address:** `0x03Fb5bFA4EB2Cba072A477A372bB87880A60fC96`

**Contract Interface:** [ICrossL2ProverV2.sol](https://github.com/polymerdao/prover-contracts/blob/e4fb42cc7a6b4b90bf3ec095a8a05c2129eab343/contracts/interfaces/ICrossL2ProverV2.sol)


  </TabItem>
</Tabs>

## Supported Chains

### Chain Support (EVM)

| Name | Testnet | Mainnet | E2E Latency | Finality |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| [Ethereum](https://ethereum.org/en/developers/docs/networks/) | ✅ | ✅ | 140-150secs | 12 Blocks |
| [Berachain](https://docs.berachain.com/developers/network-configurations) | ✅ | ✅ | 3-4secs | Single-slot |
| [Sonic](https://docs.soniclabs.com/sonic/build-on-sonic/tooling-and-infra) | ✅ | ✅ | 4-5secs | 2 Blocks |
| [BSC](https://docs.bnbchain.org/bnb-smart-chain/developers/json_rpc/json-rpc-endpoint/#bsc-mainnet-chainid-0x38-56-in-decimal) | ✅ | ✅ | 24-30secs | 12 Blocks |
| [Avalanche](https://build.avax.network/docs/quick-start/networks/mainnet) | ✅ | ✅ | 3-4secs | Single-slot |
| [Redbelly](https://redbelly.routescan.io/) | ❌ | ✅ | 15-30secs | 5 Blocks |
| [Vanar Chain](https://explorer.vanarchain.com/) | ❌ | ✅ | 30-40secs | 12 Blocks |
| [Monad](https://docs.monad.xyz/developer-essentials/network-information) | ✅ | ❌ | 4-5secs | 2 Blocks |
